name: Be a Good Friend
description:
Be a Good Friend is a real-time simulation of  the times when a friend asks you to look after their plant or dog while they're away and you stop by briefly on the way to/from work every day until they're back. Do you have what it takes to do the bare minimum?

Controls: 

Move: WASD or Arrow Keys

Pause: Escape

Button Interaction: Left Mouse Click
